turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I'd like to schedule an appointment with Dr. Emily Carter.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay, I can help with that. Can you please provide your full name and date of birth?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Sure, it's John Smith, and my date of birth is 03/15/1988.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you, Mr. Smith. What is the reason for your visit today?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: It's for my annual check-up. Also, I've been feeling a bit fatigued lately, so I'd like to discuss that as well.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Alright. Let me check Dr. Carter's availability. One moment... Okay, she has an opening next Tuesday at 2:00 PM, or Thursday at 9:00 AM. Would either of those work for you?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hmm, Tuesday at 2:00 PM is cutting it close with work. Thursday morning might be better. Is there anything later in the day on Thursday?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Let me see... No, Thursday at 9:00 AM is the only availability for that day. I can check the following week, if you prefer.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, one more question. If I were to need lab work, is there a lab in the same building, or would I have to go somewhere else? It's always such a hassle to drive all over town. I appreciate you checking!

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Yes, Mr. Smith, there is a Quest Diagnostics lab located on the second floor of the building. So, would you like to schedule for Thursday at 9:00 AM with Dr. Carter?
